name: SweetSlap.com
overview:
SweetSlap.com strives to help people improve all their relationships (romantic or otherwise) by providing its users with an “Automated Personal Relationship Assistant” sending highly tailored ideas to stimulate their relationships.

SweetSlap’s algorithm works with a user’s “Personal Relationship Profile” (single, dating, married, age, sex, sexual orientation, location, cost preferences etc) to design and execute a tailored, and proactive relationship management tool sending advice on relationship enhancing topics including Creative Date Ideas, Local Events, Every Day Tips, Sex Tips, and Calendar Reminder Service (with Unique Gift ideas) and more!

Simply load your personal preferences and then enter your relationships into the app (or link to their profile), and you will be creating your digital relationship SweetSlap DNA. When you want to do something unique together simply pull up the relationship in our app and explore the possibilities. SweetSlap will also offer proactive intelligent suggestions and ideas based on both of your interests. As well, SweetSlap will send you reminders for your key relationships to coincide with their interests and special dates – including one-touch purchase and delivery functions. From the simple loading of reminders and images into the SweetSlap user profile to receiving amazing tailored suggestions, your life will soon take on a much more stimulating existence.

SweetSlap is the Cyrano De Bergerac of Apps. Never again will you have to have this conversation: “So, what do you want to do tonight? I don’t know…what do YOU want to do??”, or wonder what you will get your dad for his birthday, or what you’ll do with friends this weekend. SweetSlap will improve how we manage and improve all of our relationships.
